description:
Yamaguchi Tamon is a former Japanese Rear Admiral (posthumously Vice Admiral) and the commander of the Second Carrier Division of the First Air Fleet during World War II.
Tamon appeared as http://anidb.net/ch86429 [Drifter] along with his badly-damaged aircraft carrier Hiryuu which is now beached on a small rocky island. He helped the http://anidb.net/ch86432 [Merchant Guild of Gubinnen] defeat the http://anidb.net/ch86431 [Orte Empire] and take control of the sea trading routes.
Source: Drifters Wiki, edited.
name: Yamaguchi Tamon
